title: IBM to Acquire Apptio Inc., Providing Actionable Financial and Operational Insights Across Enterprise IT - PR Newswire
summary: IBM has acquired Apptio for $4.6 billion to advance its existing resource optimization, observability and application management offerings. Apptio's solutions provide integrated and simplified visibility into technology spend across hybrid and multi-cloud environments, labor and associated resources. This acquisition will enable IBM to deliver enhanced business value across technology investments and drive significant synergies across several key growth areas for IBM, including automation, Red Hat, IBM's broader AI portfolio, and IBM Consulting.
green_innovation: TRUE - Apptio's solutions help organizations optimize their IT spend and performance for better outcomes, which contributes to environmental sustainability by reducing waste and increasing efficiency.
